Text: REpst Lisa Still fighting with the MoJo huh How is everything going are you able to leave with a smile on your face everyday Awesome that Susie is coming back that should be fun for you guys get the old team back together Good luck with Law school I think that is a fabulous idea I think I might go back to school as well but for what I am not yet certain I miss you too we should get together in the relatively near future Say hi to Julie for me Serena Original Message From Gang Lisa mailto Sent Monday May AM To Serena Bishop Subject RE Im great except for you know whogod we fight every dayit is so funnywhats going on with you you dont want to come back here do you i wish you would have stayedapparently they hired another consultant remember Susieshe is going to work part timewe are not busy here at allwe terminated NEVP and SPP so im usually done by talk with Murrayhows everything else going i miss youim thinking about going to law schoolcrazy huh but i figure this is my only opportunity to go back to schooli hope alls wellhang in thereits tough times but things always happens for a reasonlet me know whats up Gang Lisa Original Message From Serena Bishop mailto Sent Friday pst Lisa just wanted to say hi hope you are doing well happy april Serena

REpst Lisa hope you had a great week and have plans for this incredible weekend that is coming our way Just wanted to drop you a line a say hi Ciao Serena Original Message From Gang Lisa mailto Sent Darrin can be my backupanywaywho knowswhateveri think going back to school is good for everyoneits hard i know its going to be so hard for meim going to be so brokeoh wellits only for yearshave to
